entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
